!ln | rallias: Thats what I use for the ssh program...

as it seems you want to install phpbb3 on a ubuntu web server trhough ssh... first try to extract the tar.gz archieve (tar --help might help, tar -xzf) and then "cd /var/www" "ln -s /home/rallias/phpbb3 phpbb3"
I have it installed, but my web server only has 65 kb of space left.
